00006 // Name: Init()
00007 // Desc: Initialize the form
00008 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00009 Result Forms::WinForm::Init(FormSettings *settings, String classname, HINSTANCE instance, int cmdshow)
00010 {
00011         this->caption = settings->caption;
00012         this->windowpos = settings->windowpos;
00013         this->ismaximized = settings->ismaximized;
00014         this->windowpos = settings->windowpos;
00015         wnd_cmdshow = cmdshow;
00016 
00017         int totalwidth = settings->clientsize.width + 2 * GetSystemMetrics(SM_CXSIZEFRAME);
00018         int totalheight = settings->clientsize.height + 2 * GetSystemMetrics(SM_CYSIZEFRAME)
00019                                                                                                   + GetSystemMetrics(SM_CYCAPTION);
00020 
00021         if(settings->options & FS_CENTERTOSCREEN)
00022                 handle = CreateWindowEx(0, classname, settings->caption, WS_OVERLAPPEDWINDOW,
00023                                                                 (GetSystemMetrics(SM_CXSCREEN) - totalwidth) / 2,
00024                                                                 (GetSystemMetrics(SM_CYSCREEN) - totalheight) / 2,
00025                                                                 totalwidth, totalheight,
00026                                                                 NULL, NULL, instance, NULL);
00027         else
00028                 handle = CreateWindowEx(0, classname, settings->caption, WS_OVERLAPPEDWINDOW,
00029                                                                 settings->windowpos.x, settings->windowpos.y,
00030                                                                 totalwidth, totalheight,
00031                                                                 NULL, NULL, instance, NULL);
00032 
00033         if(!handle)
00034                 return ERR("Error creating form");
00035 
00036         if(settings->ismaximized)
00037         {
00038                 this->clientsize = Size<DWORD>(GetSystemMetrics(SM_CXFULLSCREEN), GetSystemMetrics(SM_CYFULLSCREEN));
00039         }
00040         else
00041                 this->clientsize = settings->clientsize;
00042 
00043         return R_OK;
00044 }

00048 // Desc: Show the form
00049 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 void Forms::WinForm::Show()
00051 {
00052         if(!handle)
00053                 return;
00054 
00055         ShowWindow(handle, wnd_cmdshow | (SW_SHOWMAXIMIZED * ismaximized));
00056 }
00057

00059 // Name: Hide()
00060 // Desc: Hide the form
00061 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00062 void Forms::WinForm::Hide()

00064         if(!handle)
00065                 return;
00066 
00067         ShowWindow(handle, wnd_cmdshow | (SW_SHOWMAXIMIZED * ismaximized));
